content.html: It gives me tremendous pleasure to say that my dad (who, God help him, once had to train me) has just been elected into the @mastercarvers Association, by a jury of his peers. Making him one of only 40 Master wood and stone carver's in the UK. #woodcarving #craft #woodwork
content.value:
It gives me tremendous pleasure to say that my dad (who, God help him, once had to train me) has just been elected into the @mastercarvers Association, by a jury of his peers. Making him one of only 40 Master wood and stone carver's in the UK.
#woodcarving #craft #woodwork
